conbody.p: To start using the DITAxPresso product, it is mandatory that you should have the following resources:

section.title: DITA-Open Toolkit
section.p: DITA - Open Toolkit (DITA-OT) is used for converting all the DITA files to various formats. DITA-OT will support formats like PDF and HTML5.

p.note: In the next version, Markdown format will also be supported.

section.title: Document Type Definition
section.p: Document Type Definition (DTD) is used for defining the document structure with the list of legal element and attributes.
Plugins are used for styling the ditamap in different formats.

section.title: GitHub
section.p: GitHub login is used for accessing the stored DITA projects and the source files.
section.note: DITA projects and the source files has to be provided by the Client Administrator.
